properties.name: Four-Eyes Authorization Request Created
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 42402
| extend Operation = extract("Operation=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    ["User Name"] = user,
    ["Operation Name"] = Operation,
    MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.description: Detects when a four-eyes authorization request is created.
